naslov: Podstrana – Luksuzna vila s bazenom i panoramskim pogledom na more (prodaja)
opis: NOVO U PONUDI! Podstrana – Luksuzna vila s bazenom i panoramskim pogledom na more Prodaje se moderna vila, upravo završena, smještena na atraktivnoj lokaciji u Podstrani. Ova urbana vila pruža savršen spoj suvremenog dizajna, visokokvalitetne gradnje i luksuznih sadržaja, s pogledom na more koji oduzima dah. Osnovne značajke nekretnine: • Površina i raspored: Vila je smještena na zemljištu od 980 m², dok stambeni dio iznosi 300 m² raspoređenih na tri etaže: o Suteren: Prostorija za zabavu, teretana, kupaonica, praonica i tehnička soba. o Prizemlje: Prostrani dnevni boravak otvorenog koncepta povezan s kuhinjom, blagovaonicom i spremištem, jedna spavaća soba, kupaonica te stepenište. o Prvi kat: Četiri spavaće sobe, tri kupaonice i prostrane terase. • Vanjski prostor: Uređena okućnica uključuje bazen sa slanom vodom, tehniku za grijanje i hlađenje bazena, LED rasvjetu te zasađeno zelenilo s automatskim sustavom navodnjavanja. Kvaliteta gradnje i oprema: Vila je građena prema najvišim standardima, uz korištenje visokokvalitetnih materijala i opreme: • Armirano betonski zidovi (Porotherm Profi blokovi, debljine 25 cm). • Toplinska izolacija (10 cm). • Vanjska stolarija od aluminija i PVC-a u antracit boji. • Električno podno grijanje u svim prostorijama. • Dimnjak (20 cm) i inverter klima uređaji u svim sobama. • Solarni paneli za toplu vodu (tank od 300-500 litara s električnim grijačem). • Kamene unutrašnje stepenice. • Video nadzor, videofon i satelitski sustav. • Bazenska tehnika s uređajem za elektrolizu vode i toplinskom pumpom za bazen. Lokacija: Podstrana je poznata po svojoj blizini Splita, prekrasnim plažama i mirnom okruženju idealnom za obiteljski život ili luksuzni odmor. Vila se nalazi samo nekoliko minuta vožnje od svih sadržaja, a panoramski pogled na more dodatno naglašava njen luksuzni karakter. Cijena: 1.550.000,00 € Kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju. Za sve dodatne informacije i dogovor oko razgledavanja, slobodno kontaktirajte Tonku Tomić na +385 91 534 9959 ili putem maila na t.tomic@remax.hr. Dodatne informacije o nekretnini, njezinoj točnoj lokaciji i razgledavanje mogući su nakon potpisivanja Ugovora o posredovanju s Agencijom, koji je u skladu sa Zakonom o zaštiti podataka i Zakonom o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. ---------------------------------------- NEW IN OFFER! Podstrana – Luxury villa with pool and panoramic sea view A modern villa for sale, just completed, located in an attractive location in Podstrana. This urban villa offers the perfect blend of contemporary design, high-quality construction and luxury amenities, with breathtaking sea views. Key property features: • Area and layout: The villa is located on a 980 m² plot, while the residential area is 300 m² spread over three floors: o Basement: Entertainment room, gym, bathroom, laundry room and technical room. o Ground floor: Spacious open-concept living room connected to the kitchen, dining room and storage room, one bedroom, bathroom and staircase. o First floor: Four bedrooms, three bathrooms and spacious terraces. • Outdoor area: The landscaped garden includes a saltwater pool, pool heating and cooling technology, LED lighting and planted greenery with an automatic irrigation system. Construction quality and equipment: The villa is built to the highest standards, using high-quality materials and equipment: • Reinforced concrete walls (Porotherm Profi blocks, 25 cm thick). • Thermal insulation (10 cm). • Exterior joinery made of aluminum and PVC in anthracite color. • Electric underfloor heating in all rooms. • Chimney (20 cm) and inverter air conditioners in all rooms. • Solar panels for hot water (300-500 liter tank with electric heater). • Stone interior stairs. • Video surveillance, videophone and satellite system. • Pool technology with water electrolysis device and pool heat pump. Location: Podstrana is known for its proximity to Split, beautiful beaches and peaceful surroundings ideal for family life or a luxurious vacation. The villa is located just a few minutes drive from all amenities, and the panoramic sea view further emphasizes its luxurious character. Price: €1,550,000.00 The buyer pays the agency commission. For all additional information and to arrange a viewing, please contact Tonka Tomić at +385 91 534 9959 or by email at t.tomic@remax.hr. Additional information about the property, its exact location and viewing are possible after signing the Agency Agreement with the Agency, which is in accordance with the Data Protection Act and the Real Estate Brokerage Act.
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Sustav grijanja, klimatizacije i ventilacije
